attributes.action: Do not demolish Dunnies Cafe in Otley
attributes.additional_details:
Those in the Yorkshire area will no doubt know of Dunnies cafe in Otley.

Adlington Ltd are trying to build a care home on the site of the disused school next to the cafe, part of the plans involve demolishing and building on the land where Dunnies stands.

Dunnies has been a cafe since 1925,and usually has plenty of bikers (and cyclists too) making use of it.

If you want to try to save this popular venue please sign this petition
